channel.title: Call of Duty 4 Cops and Robbers
channel.description: Just curious if anyone ever played it before. Playing it right now is why I got so curious :P

item.title: Call of Duty 4 Cops and Robbers
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:14, topic:434101”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=536819.msg3925942#msg3925942 date=1330216955]

Fuck CoD; HALO FOR LIFE

Halo 2 and 3 maybe, Reach is okish. Odst is a joke.

Halo 2 and Halo 3 are the best two games in my opinion. Reach was… a disappointment. Bungie got me and all my friends super pumped for reach when they released the beta for it. Then what it came out, it was fun for about 3 weeks before I became bored. ODST was good if you like campaign, but I’ve always liked Halo for the mulitplayer except the first and 3rd ones. Those two had fun campaign modes. (I’ve beaten the first campaign on 3 different systems. Xbox, Xbox 360, and PC). Halo Wars, I’ve never bought, but I played at my friends house and it was boring as fuck. And that’s my whole little offtopic opinion on all the Halo games I feel like discussing with Mopar.

Yeah I heard Halo Wars is almost like a board game online lol?
[/quote]

It’s a strategy game. Doesn’t fit in with the rest of the Halo Series.[/quote]To get on the Halo topic even farther; imo Bungie completely fucked themselves over by one major thing on reach, the ranking system. If you didn’t ever have any of the exp gained bullshit, and just the classic halo 2/3 system, the game would have had much more competition and overall more addictions (like the previous games had).

Read full topic
item.source: Call of Duty 4 Cops and Robbers

item.title: Call of Duty 4 Cops and Robbers
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

nohope:

I used to play cops and robbers in Mw2, but since it’s most popular with kids 12 and under I never had to much fun because somebody always ruined it by breaking the rules.

That’s why it is best to just get a group of friends and do it.

Read full topic

Halo 2 and Halo 3 are the best two games in my opinion. Reach was… a disappointment. Bungie got me and all my friends super pumped for reach when they released the beta for it. Then what it came out, it was fun for about 3 weeks before I became bored. ODST was good if you like campaign, but I’ve always liked Halo for the mulitplayer except the first and 3rd ones. item.title: Call of Duty 4 Cops and Robbers
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

reyx7:

Could you elaborate?

Two teams (cops) and (robbers) 4 or more players required. Perks include eaves drop, claymore for the cop c4 for the robber, usually sonic boom for the robber and stopping power for the cop. Cops can use shotguns and claymores, robbers can use knifes and c4. You have to tell them to get down if you are the cop and if they disobey you or try to escape jail you can shoot them They have to try and kill you, the game type is set on S and D with switch every round. I used to play it a lot but I recently got back into it with some friends.

Eh, it's alright I guess. Michael Myers is way more fun on MW2, Black Ops, or MW3.

I do agree, I love Michael Myers as well. Especially with a full lobby.

Read full topic
